Body: Possible Duplicate:  How to change Android device's default search engine?  I bought a Samsung Galaxy S II, and when I typed into the default search bar, it sent me and my search to the most obvious seaching engine of the web: Yahoo!... well, almost the most obvious...Anyway, I went to the browser setting and the only search engine available is Yahoo!. I really want it to be Google, is there any way to do that?
Title: Browser's default search engine

history.Text: I bought a Samsung Galaxy S II, and when I typed into the default search bar, it sent me and my search to the most obvious seaching engine of the web: Yahoo!... well, almost the most obvious...Anyway, I went to the browser setting and the only search engine available is Yahoo!. I really want it to be Google, is there any way to do that?

I really want it to be Google, is there any way to do that?
